publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5646 Jackie Baillie: Alexandria Medical Centre—That the Parliament regrets the delay in the building of the new Alexandria Medical Centre; notes that the final business case submitted by NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde to the Scottish Government has yet to be approved; considers the conditions in the existing medical centre appalling for staff and patients alike; further considers that the new medical centre is an essential part of the Vision for the Vale, and calls on the Scottish Government to commit the capital cost of £18.5 million without any further delay.
S3M-5646 Alexandria Medical Centre (lodged on 1 February 2010) James Kelly*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Des McNulty*
S3M-5646 Alexandria Medical Centre (lodged on 1 February 2010) Mary Mulligan*, Hugh Henry*, Bill Butler*, Trish Godman*

S3M-5646 Jackie Baillie: Alexandria Medical Centre—That the Parliament regrets the delay in the building of the new Alexandria Medical Centre; notes that the final business case submitted by NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde to the Scottish Government has yet to be approved; considers the conditions in the existing medical centre appalling for staff and patients alike; further considers that the new medical centre is an essential part of the Vision for the Vale, and calls on the Scottish Government to commit the capital cost of £18.5 million without any further delay. Supported by: James Kelly, Mr Frank McAveety, Des McNulty, Mary Mulligan, Hugh Henry, Bill Butler, Trish Godman, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-5646 Alexandria Medical Centre (lodged on 1 February 2010) Sarah Boyack*
